LandResourceMapping.title: Preparation of Municipality/Rural Municipality Level Land Resource Maps, Database and Reports of Sankhuwasabha District
LandResourceMapping.para: The project included field inventory of soil, agro-forest, and other land uses along with preparation of Municipal Level Present preparation of Municipal Level Present  Present preparation of Municipal Level Present  Present preparation of Municipal Level Present
LandResourceMapping.Client: GoN/Department of Survey/Topographical Survey & Landuse Management Division

LandResourceMapping.title: Preparation of Gaunpalika/Nagarpalika Level Land Resource Maps, Database and Reports of Jumla District
LandResourceMapping.para: The project included field inventory of soil, agro-forest, and other land uses along with preparation of Municipal Level Present Land Use, Zoning, Soil, Capability, Risk Hazard Maps. Preparation of Profile for Land Use Zoning and preparation of Cadastral Map to Superimpose on Land Use Zoning Maps was also carried out
LandResourceMapping.Client: GoN/Department of Survey/Topographical Survey & Landuse Management Division

LandResourceMapping.title: Preparation of Municipality/Rural Municipality Level Land Resource Maps, Database and Reports of Palpa District
LandResourceMapping.para: The project included field inventory of soil, agro-forest, and other land uses along with preparation of Municipal Level Present Land Use, Zoning, Soil, Capability, Risk Hazard Maps. Preparation of Profile for Land Use Zoning and preparation of Cadastral Map to Superimpose on Land Use Zoning Maps was also carried out

LandResourceMapping.title: Preparation of Municipality/Rural Municipality Level Land Resource Maps, Database and Reports of 12 VDCs of Bara District
LandResourceMapping.para: The project included field inventory of soil, forest, and other land uses; study and mapping of multi-hazards (seismic hazard and flood) assessment and mapping of terrestrial ecosystems, baseline data collection of terrestrial ecosystem and population for environmental sustainability and land use planning at VDC/town level

LandResourceMapping.title: Preparation of Municipality/Rural Municipality Level Land Resource Maps, Database and Reports of 5 VDCs of Jhapa District
LandResourceMapping.para: The project included field inventory of soil, agro-forest, and other land uses along with preparation of Municipal Level Present Land Use, Zoning, Soil, Capability, Risk Hazard Maps. Preparation of Profile for Land Use Zoning and preparation of Cadastral Map to Superimpose on Land Use Zoning Maps was also carried out

LandResourceMapping.title: Preparation of Municipality/Rural Municipality Level Land Resource Maps, Database and Reports of Dumkibas and Daunnedevi VDCs of Nawalparasi District
LandResourceMapping.para: The project included field inventory of soil, agro-forest, and other land uses along with preparation of Municipal Level Present Land Use, Zoning, Soil, Capability, Risk Hazard Maps. Preparation of Profile for Land Use Zoning and preparation of Cadastral Map to Superimpose on Land Use Zoning Maps was also carried out

ForestryNaturalResources.title: Re-measurement and Establishment(Middle Mountain Region)
ForestryNaturalResources.para: Re-measurement of 165 Permanent Sample Plots and measurement of 336 additional plots established during the Forest Resource Assesment (FRA) 2010 – 2014 in Middle Mountain physiographic regions to collect verious plot level biophysical attributs documented in FRA Field Manual for National Forest Monitoring System;

ForestryNaturalResources.title: Re-measurement and Establishment(High Mountain Region)
ForestryNaturalResources.para: Re-measurement of permanent sample plots established during the Forest Resource Assessment (FRA) 2010-2014 in Middle Mountain physiographic region in coordination with FRTC to collect various plot level biophysical attributes including bamboo resources within CCSP’s based on FRA Field Manual for Forest Resource Assessment (FRA) to prepare National Forest Monitoring System;
ForestryNaturalResources.Location: High Himal Region of Nepal : Jumla, Dolpa, Jajarkot, Manang, Mustang, Baglung and Gorkha districts

ForestryNaturalResources.title: National Forest Inventory Re-measurement of Plots (Cluster 1: Sample Plot Measurement in Middle Mountain)
ForestryNaturalResources.para: Re-measurement of permanent sample plots established during the Forest Resource Assessment (FRA) 2010-2014 in Middle Mountain (180 plots starting from the eastern part of Nepal) physiographic regions to collect the various plot level biophysical attributes documented in FRA Field Manual for National Forest Monitoring System;

ForestryNaturalResources.title: National Forest Inventory Re-measurement of Plots (Cluster 2: Sample Plot Measurement in High Mountain and High Himal)
ForestryNaturalResources.para: Re-measurement of permanent sample plots established during the Forest Resource Assessment (FRA) 2010-2014 in Middle Mountain (180 plots starting from the eastern part of Nepal) physiographic regions to collect the various plot level biophysical attributes documented in FRA Field Manual for National Forest Monitoring System
ForestryNaturalResources.Location: High Mountain and High Himal of Nepal

ForestryNaturalResources.title: Establishment and Measurement of National Forest Inventory Sample Plots in Terai and Mid- Mountain Region
ForestryNaturalResources.para: Re-measurement of permanent sample plots established during the Forest Resource Assessment (FRA) 2010-2014 in Middle Mountain physiographic region in coordination with FRTC to collect various plot level biophysical attributes including bamboo resources within CCSP’s based on FRA Field Manual for Forest Resource Assessment (FRA) to prepare National Forest Monitoring System

ForestryNaturalResources.title: Forest Resources Assessment – Nepal (5 year bilateral project with MoFSC and Finnish Government)
ForestryNaturalResources.para: National Forest Inventory using multi source approach with remote sensing, LiDAR and forest inventory, LiDAR data based forest biometric modeling for CO2 estimation, biodiversity mapping, wall-to-wall land cover mapping, development of Open Source Forest Information System, human resources development.

UrbanMap.title: Urban Base Map and Municipal GIS of Kageshwari Manohara Municipality
UrbanMap.para: Preparation of GIS-based Integrated Municipal GIS Map of Kageshwori Manohara Municipality with 1:2500 scale for the urban area using Pleiades multispectral stereo satellite imagery of 0.5m ground resolution, system design and GIS data modeling for urban GIS, socioeconomic database, metric household numbering, street and house addressing and

UrbanMap.title: Urban Map of Amargadhi Municipality
UrbanMap.para: Preparation of digital base map of 1:2,500 scale using digital photogrammetry technique, image processing of high resolution GeoEye 0.5m imagery, system design and GIS data modeling for urban GIS, socio-economic census survey, metric street and house addressing; cadastral management system;

UrbanMap.title: Urban Base Map and Integrated Municipal GIS of Kathmandu Metropolitan City, Ward No -35
UrbanMap.para: Preparation of GIS-based Integrated Municipal GIS Map of Kathmandu Metropolitan City Ward-35 Development of Municipal Geographical Information System incorporating addressing system, existing infrastructures, demography socio-economy census survey, environment, administration units etc. Development and establishment of effective metric house

UrbanMap.title: Urban Map of Itahari Municipality
UrbanMap.para: Preparation of digital base map of 1:2,500 scale using digital photogrammetry technique, image processing of high resolution GEoEye 0.5m imagery, system design and GIS data modeling for urban GIS, household level socio-economic census survey , street and house addressing; cadastral management and land taxation system

UrbanMap.title: GIS-based Digital Base Map and Creating Urban Database of Janakpur Municipality
Digital Base Maps of Butwal Municipality
Urban Base Map and Municipal GIS for Banepa Municipality
Urban Base Map and Municipal GIS for Ratnanagar Municipality
Urban Base Map and Municipal GIS for Bharatpur Municipality
Poverty Mapping Gender Assessment and Need Identification for the Poor in Bharatpur
UrbanMap.para: The project was carried out to enhance the pro-poor urban governance of municipalities and develop the basis for pro-poor program through poverty mapping and gender assessment.

UrbanMap.title: Poverty Mapping Gender Assessment and Need Identification for the Poor in Panauti
UrbanMap.para: The project was carried out to enhance the pro-poor urban governance of municipalities and develop the basis for pro-poor program through poverty mapping and gender assessment.

HazardStudies.title: Determination of Flood Warning and Danger of Mohana and Macheli River
HazardStudies.para: This study has been conducted to determine threshold value of discharge and water level for flood warning and danger levels at forecasting stations of Mohana and Macheli River in the Far-Western Nepal for the purpose of developing threshold-stagebased operational flood early warning system.
HazardStudies.Location: Mohana River (Kailali and Kanchanpur District) and Macheli River (Kanchanpur District)

HazardStudies.title: Risk Hazard Map of Panauti Municipality
HazardStudies.para: The main objective of the project was to determine the various hazard risk to people , the physical and natural environment, their social and economic activities and critical infrastructure supporting the health and viability of the communities and settlements in the municipality

HazardStudies.title: Risk Hazard Map of Banepa Municipality
HazardStudies.para: The main objective of the project was to determine the various hazard risk to people , the physical and natural environment, their social and economic activities and critical infrastructure supporting the health and viability of the communities and settlements in the municipality

HazardStudies.title: Nepal-India Trans-boundary Resilience Project Inundation Mapping
HazardStudies.Location: Narayani and Triyuga and Koshi River

HazardStudies.title: Survey of River Cross Section, Discharge Measurement and Control Point Data/ Details of 10 Rivers
HazardStudies.Location: Western and Far-Western Terai Region of Nepal

HazardStudies.title: Baseline and Socio-economic Survey of the Ecosystem Based Adaption Project Area
HazardStudies.Location: Panchase Area, (Kaski, Parbat and Syangja Districts)

HazardStudies.title: Municipal Profile in Terms of Earthquake Risk and Vulnerability” and “Report on Impact of Settlement Pattern, Land Use Practice and Options in High Risk Areas of Five Municipalities
HazardStudies.Client: GoN/Ministry of Physical Planning and Works, Earthquake Risk Reduction and Recovery Preparednes s Programme for Nepal UNDP/ ERRRP
HazardStudies.Location: Biratnagar Sub- Metropolitan city, Hetauda Municipality, Pokhara Sub- Metropolitan city, Birendranagar and Dhangadhi Municipality

RSLUP.title: RSLUP pf Karnali Province
RSLUP.para: The project included field inventory of soil, agro-forest

RSLUP.title: RSLUP of four municipalities (TAYAR Nepal)
RSLUP.para: The project included field inventory of soil, agro-forest,

RSLUP.title: Integrated Risk Sensitive Land Use Plan (RSLUP) and GIS based Evacuation Route Modelling for Changunarayan Municipality
RSLUP.para: The project included preparation of multi-hazard vulnerability risk profiles of Changunarayan Municipality and preparation of RSLUP, Planning Regulations and building bye-laws

RSLUP.title: Support to Chautara Municipality to Develop Risk Sensitive Land Use Plan (RSLUP) and to Update Building Bye-Laws (Municipal Level)
Support to Develop Risk Sensitive Land Use Plan(RSLUP) and Building Byelaws of Kathmandu Valley (22 Municipalities) with training and Capacity Building
Comprehensive Study of Urban Growth Trend and Forecasting of Land Use in Kathmandu Valley

Training.title: Support to Develop Risk Sensitive Land Use Plan(RSLUP) and Building Byelaws of Kathmandu Valley (22 Municipalities) with training and Capacity Building
Training on Capacity Building of Selected Municipalities and DUDBC Personnel on the Use of Urban Base map and Municipal GIS
Training.para: The primarily objective of the training was to develop institutional capacity of the municipalities to effectively use of urban base map and GIS for informed decision making and sustainable urban development Developing training curricula in conducting training for stakeholder including GoN and Municipal personnel in GIS based data management system
Training.Location: Lalitpur Sub-metropolitan City and Bhaktapur Municipality

Training.title: Training on GIS for Capacity Building of Selected Municipalities & DUDBC Personnel on the Use of GIS Based Urban Map with Municipal Information System
Training.para: GIS training for developing institutional capacity and human resources of the programmed municipalities and DUDBC personnel in the application of GIS for urban planning and management. The training program had envisaged to impart technical knowledge and skills in operating GIS for using urban base map and municipal information system developed under UEIP, UDP Projects and under DUDBC's urban base mapping initiatives. Developing training

metric.title: Metric Addressing of Kageshwori Municipality
metric.para: The project included field inventory of soil, agro-forest,

photogrammetry.title: High Resolution Digital Elevation Model (DEM) of Koshi Basin
photogrammetry.para: Develop suitable method for extraction of DEM using available very high resolution stereo imagery data, field data and spot heights from DGPS Survey
photogrammetry.Client: DHM/BRC H funded by World Bank
photogrammetry.Location: Eastern Terai Region Koshi River, D/S of Chatara Dam

photogrammetry.title: High Resolution Digital Elevation Model (DEM) of Kageshwori Municipality

photogrammetry.title: High Resolution Digital Elevation Model (DEM) of Changunarayan Municipality
photogrammetry.para: The project included field inventory of soil, agro-forest,

bamboo.title: Bamboo Resource Assessment (Outside the Forest Area)
bamboo.para: Bamboo resource assessment was carried outside the forest area of whole Nepal. The bamboo plots were located and recorded along with all the measurements and sample collection for biomass calculation. Density and abundance mapping of each major bamboo species was carried out. Bamboo distribution was also analysed using Google Earth Engine.
